p.span: By submitting this form, I expressly consent and authorize ACCEL Schools to contact me at the number(s) provided via text or short message service (SMS) as well as by phone, regarding educational matters. I understand that these calls may be generated using automated technology and that message and data rates may apply, for which I will be solely financially responsible.

div.p: Now Enrolling Grades K – 6 for the Fall

Empowering Students to Achieve Their Full Potential. Now Enrolling. Inkster Preparatory Academy is a K-6 public charter school and has been selected as a 2017 Innovative School District for showing great strides in strengthening rigorous learning for ALL students, increasing student achievement, and building a culture of innovation. Our school is conveniently located on the corner of Inkster Road and Woodsfield Street, between Michigan Avenue and Cherry Hill. Bus transportation is offered to students residing more than one-half mile away from our campus.
There are no upcoming events at this time.
Now Enrolling for the 2020-21 School Year!

img.span: Accredited by Cognia™ For meeting the highest standards of education in ongoing third-party review.

Weekly Update – 7/10/16 Dear Parents, This week families came out on Saturday, July 9th to catch a sneak peak of Inkster Prep Academy and met Dr. Seuss' Cat in the Hat, got their faces painted, played video games, and had beautiful sculptures created by a balloon artist! What a great time!!! We look…

div.span:
Thank you for choosing Inkster Preparatory Academy
for your child and allowing us to serve your family.
To begin the enrollment process, please click below.

div.p: Our highest priority is to keep all scholars, staff, families, and community members safe as we navigate these difficult times.

div.p: Our summer office hours are Mon-Fri 9am-4pm or by appointment. We will be closed 7/4. Our regular office hours will resume the first day of school: 9/3/19.
